extensions.title: Previously Analysed Extensions
extensions.extensionSelectHelp: Upload a .zip or .crx file containing the browser extension.

virustotal.title: VirusTotal
virustotal.apiKeyHelp: Enter your VirusTotal API key to enable url scanning.
virustotal.apiKeySuccessMessage: The API key will be used to scan urls for malicious activity.

largeFileWarning.title: Large File Warning
largeFileWarning.description: This file has {{lineCount}} lines which may take a while to render. Rendering large files can impact performance.
